answers.answer: Oh my goodness. I thought I was alone in this ha ha!! I usually eat whatever is quick lol...as long as I can eat then I'm ok Lmbo its so weird Smh and the sad part is I eat before I go to bed!!
I have a minifridge by my bed for this exact reason lols I like have to eat almost constantly or I start feeling sick

I have a big meal b4 bed too!when I wake up I'm soooooo tired and wander wether its nesecasry for me to go down and the answer is always yes otherwise I sit and think in bed what could have been.....LOL!
My daughter or belly won't allow me time to think...when my belly growls she kicks...like hey woman you know what we want lol!
I would but I'm not allowed...having gestational diabetes takes all the fun outta pregnancy :((

question: Hi is anyone else waking up @ ridiculous'o'clock to rummage the fridge for food? It's like 2:30am and I'm here eating a massive bowl of cocopops!i couldn't find one big enough so I'm using the cake mixing bowl!hahaha!what's your midnight feasts???x
title: midnight feast!
